title: The Camera industry of Japan
brief_description: Japanese cameras are world famous and eagerly sought after in the western world today. This film visits the factories and shows the methods used in the construction of various types of cameras which are exported all over the world.
description: Japanese cameras are world famous and eagerly sought after in the western world today. This film visits the factories and shows the methods used in the construction of various types of cameras which are exported all over the world.
